amendment.description: Amendment to define annual cost to the economy as being inclusive of business revenue, so that determination of the bills application shall be accurately applied.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 14 printed in Part B of House Report 112-616 to define annual cost to the economy as being inclusive of business revenue, so that determination of the bills application shall be accurately applied.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Schweikert amendment (A014) Agreed to by voice vote.
